edges.description: Values representing the edges of bins.

null.description: Value to which to map if there is no valid bin (e.g. if the element falls outside the bin range).

inclusive_left.description: Whether or not the left edge of the bin is inclusive, i.e. the bins are of the form [lower, upper).

name: bin

digitize.description: set to false to output bin sides

side.description: How to refer to each bin. Will be either the `lower` edge, the `upper` edge, or the `midpoint` (the arithmetic mean of the two).

description:
Maps data to bins.

Bins will be of the form [lower, upper) or (lower, upper].
